I just wanna check on wht is the average proportion ppl give their parent relative to their salary? Like cpf would be 20%  would you be contributing 20% to ur parents too?
20% is a lot man…Shouldn’t have a percentage to it.Just give what you can.

Depending on your age and expenses I think.Generally under 25 and working + still studying part time (+ maybe paying school fees) are not really expected to give parent money.Above 25 is generally expected to at least help with the housing expenses/give parent money  but I think 20% is too much.
Hi all  just to check.. I just tried using uob one card to withdraw money but it is not working. The debit card given to me. We can’t withdraw from uob one acc using atm?
kindly be more specific.What kind of purchase - what shop  what productWhat are you chasing  cashback or miles
citi smrt 5% rebate (if mcc not excluded)
You need to go counter to check it and link it to your acct if not done so.
I done. I able to withdraw now as ppl in other grp share that I need to select current acc instead of saving. I didn’t know uob one is current acc. Ty

Hi all for crmc  when it says 4mpd for online transactions… in this case amaze will turn my offline transactions online. What’s the definition of offline transactions? Example going to a fast food restaurant and using paywave?
paywave/inserting cardwhen in doubt  just pass thru all CRMC txns using amaze
I see  thanks! So generally this is how I should utilise my amaze and crmc?online transactions -> CrmcAnything else -> amaze
yup  sock drawer the physical card at home  and don't add it to any wallet except amaze
I see okie thanks  would I still earn points if I use crmc for offline transactions?
for non-online txns  there's a whitelist for 4mpd on certain clothing store MCCs. otherwise 0.4mpd if not on citi's general exclusion list
Assuming let’s say a transaction is $50  does amaze charge the cc $50 as well or is there some admin fee/hidden cost
no admin fee for SGD txns. for FCY there's usually around 1.8% spread when converting to SGD
Wow that’s actually nice considering there is no fee for sg txns and allowing you to covert these offline txns to earn the 4mpd
